title: Madred's Bloodrazor needs to be nerfed
body:
Kog'Maw should not be allowed to deal 10% of my maximum health as magic damage every auto.

nerf this item please

I can't imagine any item being more broken on a champion like Warwick in years to come.

How so?

madrets bloodrazor gave 30(later 40) ad, 40%as, 25armor and 4% hp magical on hit
BotrK grants 25ad, 40%as, 12%lifesteal and 8%current health physical damag on-hit(which is 4%hp in average)

So they are damn similar, just that BotrK costs 650g less and is far  more effecktive on physical DDs with the lifesteal and physical on-hit, but less effecktive on hybrid damageing bruisers like WW or Shyvana.
Just that ontop off nearly equal stats for less gold, you als get an massive active out of BotrK, makeing it stronger than madrets ever was.
